name: Neuroses
description:
a game about imagining how things could go wrong at all times, made at a time when i was almost certainly suffering from undiagnosed depression

i wouldn't make some of the jokes in this today, and i now know how to fix the bug that made the text blurry but i'm not going to change it, sorry!

https://www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/node/2955

originally posted to glorious trainwrecks, a site that was a blessing to those of us who loved making scrappy games prior to the itch age we find ourselves in now
